products.name: iPad 10.2 2021 WiFi 64GB
products.description:
The iPad 10.2 inch 2021 still has a design characterized by thin and light, making it easy for users to manipulate and hold for hours without feeling tired or uncomfortable. The monolithic design that has been the hallmark of the iPad product line helps bring a luxurious look when using a hand name.
The screen of the iPad 10.2 inch 2021 is large and the display is vivid. The True Tone screen on the 10.2-inch iPad also supports adjusting the screen according to color temperature.
iPad Gen 9 is powered by the A13 Bionic chip. This is a chip manufactured on the 7nm + process, allowing processing performance 6 times higher than the previous generation.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 5G
products.description:
The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 tablet does not disappoint users with a series of top-notch technologies for the device with a super-sharp 11' LCD screen, 120Hz refresh rate, image technology that brings a great visual experience. The Tab S8 screen supports a wide color range so that users can easily edit images and design graphics on the device without worrying about the problem of color deviation when presenting on other devices.
You love movies and music. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 immerses you in a space of sound that is as vivid and realistic as being in a calibrated theater. HyperFast 5G technology lets you enjoy a wide range of experiences outdoors or on the go. The 120 Hz refresh rate display helps enter games for a responsive, smooth experience.

products.name: Laptop gaming MSI GF63 Thin 11SC 664VN
products.description:
The MSI Gaming GF63 Thin 11SC-664VN laptop is a product in the mid-range price segment, suitable for gamers. This is a laptop with a compact appearance but still has a gaming style.

Slim appearance but still bold gaming
Overall, the laptop has a rather slim appearance, with a total thickness of only 21.7 mm and a weight of about 1.86 kg. However, because it is a gaming machine, the middle part of the lid is imprinted with the familiar red dragon logo to create a highlight. More specifically, the ventilation section at the bottom is printed with a unique X-shaped print.

products.name: Mac mini M2 2023 (8 CPU - 10 GPU - 8GB - 256GB)
products.description:
Mac Mini M2 is a highly appreciated product from features to design, the manufacturer has improved to meet the different needs of customers compared to its predecessor. The product has been expected since before launch with the number of pre-orders increasing continuously when it is officially launched in the market.

Outstanding performance
With memory capacity up to 8GB 256GB, users can freely download heavy games, documents to the server but still have space. Equipped with a powerful chipset Apple M2 with 8 CPU cores, 10 GPU cores, 16 Neural Engine cores and 100GB/s memory bandwidth and creates smoothness and responsiveness when performing tasks.

products.name: Loa tháp Samsung MX-T40
products.description:
Samsung MX-T40/XV Tower Speaker – Stir up any party
There are a lot of sound products on the market with weird textures, but no matter what, sound is still the quality that needs top attention. If you need to find a speaker that is full of unique and strange elements, then choose the Samsung MX-T40 speaker.

Tower structure, easy to connect bluetooth
The speaker has a special structure, reminiscent of great architectural works such as the Eiffel Tower, Burj Khalifa, etc. So not only for listening to music, but also as an outstanding decoration in the house. your home space.

products.name: Microphone Saramonic BlinkMe B2
products.description:
Microphone Saramonic Blink Me - Touch screen, outstanding quality
The Saramonic Blink Me Microphone is a device that delivers high-end recording quality, reaching a stable 48kHz/24bit standard. Microphone is also equipped with a touch screen, supports customization, flexible touch and swipe.
Different design with modern touch screen
The Saramonic Blink Me Microphone is a lapel microphone product, impressively compact but very different. Specifically, this Saramonic microphone has a circular shape, with a modern touch screen on the top for both the receiver and the transmitter.
Therefore, users can easily customize actions during recording by flexibly swiping instead of using the button function. Moreover, this screen also clearly displays the parameters, supports you to monitor the recording status and can change the wallpaper at will.
Outstanding recording quality, safe storage
Although the Saramonic Blink Me microphone is compact, it delivers outstanding recording quality with 48kHz/24bit standard. Combined with that is 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology, supporting stable sound and eliminating ambient noise with Noise Reduction feature.

products.name: Loa Bluetooth Marshall Emberton
products.description: In the high-end speaker segment of the Marshall brand, the Marshall Emberton Bluetooth speaker is a premium audio device with excellent quality and luxurious design. Possessing a compact, durable design and clear, detailed sound reproduction, Marshall Emberton offers a wonderful and diverse listening experience. If you are a music lover and passionate about entertainment, this Marshall speaker will definitely be a great choice for you.

products.name: Loa Bluetooth Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7
products.description:
Speaker Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 is a product manufactured by Harman Kardon, possessing a novel design, combined with Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity, promising to be a product that brings you interesting experiences and Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere.

Genuine Onyx Studio 7 bluetooth speaker has a new and beautiful design with a circular shape combined with an anodized handle, making it look like the image of a globe. Thanks to this unique design, this 7th generation speaker brings personality and style to the owner.

products.name: Remax RM-598 wired headphones sound or noise canceling
